mailing-address.narrative: Oxfam House, John Smith Drive, Oxford, OX4 2JY

description.narrative: Coordination efforts are ongoing on the ground and Oxfam is one of the agencies on the ground with ongoing Water Sanitation and Hygiene (WaSH) in schools programs. This places Oxfam at an advantage of presence and awareness of actors on the ground as well as gaps. Oxfam works with communities through Community Health Volunteers (CHVs) and having implemented in the area, it will be easy to reactivate and train CHVs for this particular response. This will be a priority as CHVs play a key role in community mobilisation as well as setting up of community structures eg community health committees. Once this activity is attained Oxfam together with the CHVs will then commence an intense community mobilisation - awareness raising campaign and at the same time undertake identify most vulnerable households to support with Non -Food Item (NFI) kits. It is expected that by the end of 45 days Oxfam's work will have covered a safe water chain , hand washing and distribute hygiene kits for the beneficiary communities.
